headline: Why Investors Were Upbeat About Chevron Stock on Tuesday
summary: Investors concerned about relatively weak oil prices got a boost Tuesday from comments by Chevron (NYSE: CVX) CEO Mike Wirth.  Making rather bullish statements about both the energy business and the broader macroeconomy, the Chevron leader managed to reassure investors about the company's current state.  Investors were bullish on Chevron's future, as the stock closed up by almost 3%.

headline: Chevron CEO sees no signs of imminent U.S. recession
summary: Investing.com -- Chevron Corp (NYSE:CVX) CEO Mike Wirth said Monday he sees no clear signs of a U.S. recession on the horizon, despite declining oil prices and broader economic uncertainty. In an interview with CNBC, Wirth emphasized that while growth may be slowing, leading indicators do not yet point to outright contraction.

headline: TotalEnergies and Chevron start production at Ballymore offshore field
summary: Chevron aims to produce 300,000 net barrels of oil equivalent per day from the Gulf by 2026 as part of its strategic plan.
